headline: Western Australia seeks local vanadium for 500MWh Kalgoorlie battery storage project

headline: Is Europe heading for another PV module oversupply situation?

headline: Vikram Solar starts work at 5GW TOPCon module manufacturing facility in India

headline: India adds 11GW solar PV in Q3 2025 – IEEFA

headline: Philippines awards Acciona Energía 180MW solar project in latest auction
